about_the_game:
The Siege of Jeomdo is a narrative-driven, roleplaying game set on the island of Jeomdo, home of artisans, master craftsmen and humble families. Take command as a retired veteran who is drawn into one final battle to defend his new home. With supplies dwindling and time running out, can you rally your warriors' resolve and guide them through impossible odds? Manage resources, explore branching storylines, and face the crushing weight of leadership in a village on the brink.



Jeomdo is home to a rich tapestry of characters - the very heartbeat of this conflict.

As you navigate the challenges ahead, you’ll forge relationships with a diverse cast: like Nuri, the outcast huntress; Moon soo, a pacifist monk offering wisdom amidst chaos; and Ji ho, a family man skilled in shaping miraculous clay. You’ll meet many more along the way. You might even share a drink with an unlikely ally.



  • Time Management: Spend your limited time gathering resources, training warriors, building defences and preparing for upcoming battles. Time is precious. Spend each day wisely.

  • Scouting: Send the island’s best hunters to scour the island, looking for ways to cripple the invading army before they arrive. Gather intel to inform your preparations.

  • Resource Management: Supplies and Resolve are your most valuable resources. Gather Supplies by assigning labour, and build Resolve by training your would-be militia. Keep your village and its defenders ready for the oncoming threat.

  • Warfare: Battles will put your leadership skills to the test. You must decide who lives and who dies. War is brutal, and hardships come with every fight. Use your cunning and carefully prepared resources to lay traps, set ambushes, and risk the lives of those you care most for to secure victory.



Your successes and failures will shape the branching story and the lives of those who trust in you. You’ll be challenged with unique dilemmas as you prepare unlikely combatants for battle. With food running low, who gets to eat? Do you show mercy to captured invaders, or make an example of them? How far will you go to protect your new home?

content_descriptors.notes: Contains text-based violence, cartoon violence & mild references to alcohol & tobacco.

name: The Siege of Jeomdo
short_description: Hope flickers against impossible odds. In this narrative RPG, step into the shoes of a retired soldier, thrust into a desperate last stand to save Jeomdo Village. With supplies dwindling and time running out, your decisions will shape the fate of those who look to you for salvation.
